actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-529.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #642 (319-1).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 2335, a bill to provide for a research, development, and evaluation program to determine the feasibility of collecting in space solar energy to be transmitted to Earth and to generate electricity for domestic purposes.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended, roll call #642 (319-1)) Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H. R. 2335 (Solar energy program)

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 2335, a bill to provide for a research, development, and evaluation program to determine the feasibility of collecting in space solar energy to be transmitted to Earth and to generate electricity for domestic purposes.
